element.name: enabled
element.label: Aktiviert
Enabled
element.description: Soll das Plugin aktiviert sein?
Should the plugin be activated?

element.name: apiKey
element.label: API-Schlüssel
API key
element.description: Ein API-Schlüssel wird benötigt um SMS senden zu können. Erfahren Sie mehr auf sms77.io.
An API key is needed in order to send SMS. Get yours now at sms77.io.

element.name: events
element.label: Ereignisse
Events
element.description: Definiert die Ereignisse zum Versenden von SMS.
Defines the events when to send SMS.

element.name: textOnOrderStateCancelled
element.label: Stornonachricht
Cancellation message
element.value: Dear customer. We are sorry about the cancelled order. We hope to serve you again soon. Best regards!
element.description: Definiert den SMS-Inhalt bei Stornierungen.
Defines the text content for cancellations.

element.name: textOnOrderStateReadyForDelivery
element.label: Versandnachricht
Shipping message
element.value: Dear customer. Your order is ready to be shipped. Log in to your customer account for more information. Best regards!
element.description: Definiert den SMS-Inhalt bei Versandbestätigung.
Defines the text content for shipping confirmation.

element.name: textOnOrderStateCompletelyDelivered
element.label: Ausliefernachricht
Delivery message
element.value: Dear customer. Your order has just been delivered by our logistics partner. Thank you for shopping. Enjoy your goods and best regards!
element.description: Definiert den SMS-Inhalt bei erfolgter Auslieferung.
Defines the text content for delivery confirmation.

element.name: textOnOrderStateClarificationRequired
element.label: Klärungsnachricht
Clarification message
element.value: Dear customer. Your order needs some clarification. Please contact us as soon as possible in order to get your order fulfilled. Best regards!
element.description: Definiert den SMS-Inhalt bei Klärungsbedarf.
Defines the text content for clarification requests.

element.name: textOnPaymentState1stReminder
element.label: Erinnerungsnachricht #1
1st reminder message
element.value: Dear customer. This is just a little reminder that your order still needs to be paid before it gets shipped. Best regards!
element.description: Definiert den SMS-Inhalt für die erste Erinnerungsnachricht.
Defines the text content for the first reminder.

element.name: textOnPaymentState2ndReminder
element.label: Erinnerungsnachricht #2
2nd reminder message
element.value: Dear customer. We hereby inform you again that your order is still unpaid as of now. Please hurry in order to get it shipped quickly. Best regards!
element.description: Definiert den SMS-Inhalt für die zweite Erinnerungsnachricht.
Defines the text content for the second reminder.

element.name: textOnPaymentState3rdReminder
element.label: Erinnerungsnachricht #3
3rd reminder message
element.value: Dear customer. This is the last chance for you to pay for your order before we can finally ship it to you. Best regards!
element.description: Definiert den SMS-Inhalt für die dritte Erinnerungsnachricht.
Defines the text content for the third reminder.

element.name: from
element.label: Absenderkennung
Sender
element.description: Definiert die Absenderkennung der übermittelten Nachrichten.
Defines the sender name for transmitted messages.

element.name: signature
element.label: Signatur
Signature
element.description: Text, welcher jeder ausgehenden Nachricht hinzugefügt wird.
Text to add to every outgoing message.

element.name: signaturePosition
element.label: Signatur-Position
Signature Position
element.description: Bestimmt, wo die Signatur in der Nachricht eingefügt wird.
Defines where in the message to add the signature.
